data.message:
port move_base_msgs to ROS2 actions (#10)

* port move_base_msgs to ROS2 actions

* fixing package xml dependencies

* removing builtin interfaces and std_msgs as dependencies

* alpha

* move existing ROS 1 maintainers to authors for now
